text: Mount Copaja or Capaja (Cerro Capaja) is a mountain in the Western Andes, located in the province of Oruro, Bolivia (c. 18°09'S, 68°22'W). It has an altitude of 5097 m and is in the neighbourhood of the higher Lliscaya and Curumane peaks. == References == *List of peaks in the Andes *GEONet Name Server database *List of mountains of Bolivia Copaja
title: Mount Copaja
